comments.author: antaresproject
comments.body: Currently showing on the first page explorer https://brisescan.com/tokens of the overall Bitgert tokens, at number #4 spot Antares Codes Token (ACO) and  #5 Trade51 Token (T51). This should bring us exposure and brand awareness.

comments.author: nimogsm
comments.body: I think it's too early to announce the exchange.The product looks unfinished.if you add /ru in the address bar, you can see a lot of errors, hire a translator to fix it.And I didn't find any information about the exchange token,what advantages does it give?and I didn't find any information about the exchange token, what advantages does it give?

comments.author: antaresproject
comments.body: Quote from: nimogsm on December 06, 2022, 07:21:17 PMI think it's too early to announce the exchange.The product looks unfinished.if you add /ru in the address bar, you can see a lot of errors, hire a translator to fix it.And I didn't find any information about the exchange token,what advantages does it give?and I didn't find any information about the exchange token, what advantages does it give?Hello and thanks for your feedback,The site is currently only in English, you only have EN available on the main top menu. If you type /ru and 30+ other languages, the site will show in the language, but with many errors (from Lavarel default script). We will remove this until we decide wish language we will be integrated to the platform.As for tokens, yes, we will add better description and links to the respective project.ACO Token and MACO Coin are from the Antares Codes project: https://antares.codes/

comments.author: nimogsm
comments.body: Quote from: antaresproject on December 07, 2022, 04:42:58 AMQuote from: nimogsm on December 06, 2022, 07:21:17 PMI think it's too early to announce the exchange.The product looks unfinished.if you add /ru in the address bar, you can see a lot of errors, hire a translator to fix it.And I didn't find any information about the exchange token,what advantages does it give?and I didn't find any information about the exchange token, what advantages does it give?Hello and thanks for your feedback,The site is currently only in English, you only have EN available on the main top menu. If you type /ru and 30+ other languages, the site will show in the language, but with many errors (from Lavarel default script). We will remove this until we decide wish language we will be integrated to the platform.As for tokens, yes, we will add better description and links to the respective project.ACO Token and MACO Coin are from the Antares Codes project: https://antares.codes/Thank you for the answer, it would also be interesting to read what your development plan is and how you will attract new users to the exchange.How exactly does this exchange differ from many others?

comments.author: antaresproject
comments.created_time: December 07, 2022, 09:02:18 PMLast edit: December 07, 2022, 09:35:02 PM by antaresproject
comments.body: Quote from: nimogsm on December 07, 2022, 07:16:35 PMThank you for the answer, it would also be interesting to read what your development plan is and how you will attract new users to the exchange.How exactly does this exchange differ from many others?[/quote]On the landing page, you can read that this exchange is pretty much not like any other exchanges. It's the First Cryptocurrency Exchange with Zero-Fee Trading and Zero-Fee withdrawal on BRISE and Bitgert Tokens and some other selected coins.So marketing will start with the Bitgert community.We also have a plan for a DEX parallel exchange in 2023, as well as a launchpad, and many other unique feature and services.A roadmap is in the making.

comments.author: antaresproject
comments.body: Demand for crypto continues to soar, and their potential for more returns makes them a gift that keeps on giving. There’s no better time than the holiday season to get friends, family and loved ones interested in the crypto world. Get your ACO, MACO and T51 Now: https://trade51.co

comments.author: antaresproject
comments.body: By popular demand, we get requested every week for staking ACO Tokens. As of January 17, 2023, this will be possible on the Antares Codes main platform. The minimum staking amount will be 1,000 Tokens (lock 30 days) for a monthly yield of 1.5% and yearly of 18%.Moreover, staking will also be available for Trade51 Token (T51) and a new Mystery Token (announcement on January, 17, 2023).So get prepared now and grab at least the minimum requirement of 1,000 for each token to be in the first batch of lucky stakers. https://trade51.co

comments.body: Christmas is a time of joy and peace, and I hope that you will experience an abundance of both. On behalf of the Antares Codes/Trade51 teams. Merry Christmas to you all and your families!
